question: Mogao Caves, also known as “Caves of the Thousand Buddhas” are located in which among the following countries?
explanation: The Mogao Caves, or Mogao Grottoes form a system of 492 temples 25 km southeast of the center of Dunhuang, an oasis strategically located at a religious and cultural crossroads on the Silk Road, in Gansu province, China. They are World Heritage Sites.
